CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: On the basis of this result , it has been confirmed that π-π stacking was more effective in PQCDTB than in PCZDTB because of coplanarity of the quinacridone unit that was introduced to the main chain of PQCDTB.

Let's think step by step.

Material Name
---
π-π stacking
PQCDTB
PCZDTB
quinacridone unit

Note: I'm assuming that "PQCDTB" and "PCZDTB" are names of materials, as they are mentioned in the context of comparing the effectiveness of "π-π stacking" between them. Similarly, the "quinacridone unit" is considered a material because it is a component of the PQCDTB material.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Material Name
---
π-π stacking
PQCDTB

Note: After re-evaluating the paragraph, I found that only "π-π stacking" and "PQCDTB" can be confidently identified as material names. The other entities mentioned in the paragraph are either properties or components of materials, but not materials themselves.
